content.rendered:
TERMS OF USE

PLEASE CAREFULLY REVIEW THE TERMS OF USE OF THE CHAIIWALA WEBSITE

Usage of the website indicates an acceptance of the chaiiwala® terms and conditions. Please cease to use this website if you do not agree to be bound by the terms of use. chaiiwala® reserves the right to change these terms of use as we see fit and we advise users to check these as the sustained usage of the site indicates and acceptance of these changed terms.

For any questions or queries related to these terms of use, please send an email to info@chaiiwala.co.uk
We endeavour to keep information as accurate and up-to-date as possible, however we urge caution not to assume all information is timely regarding Chaiiwala Holdings Ltd (chaiiwala®). This website should not only be the main source of information in particular those individuals looking to make an investment decision regarding chaiiwala®.


COPYRIGHT AND TRADEMARK

Unless stated, every resource on this website are protected as the trademark, copyrights, trade dress, and/or other intellectual properties owned by chaiiwala® and/or its subsidiaries and affiliates or by other parties that have given permission to chaiiwala®.

All rights not expressly granted are reserved.

 


PERSONAL USE

The usage of any material found on this website is for information-based purposes only. You are in a no way allowed to modify, publish, display, distribute, transmit or copy the contents of this website in any shape or form. You may not display, copy or distribute any information from this website or any part of it to third parties. You must not link to or duplicate any part of this website. No use, distribution or reproduction is permitted without express written permission from chaiiwala®. Any breach of these rights will result in immediate legal action via the appropriate channels. You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless chaiiwala® for all and any unauthorised use you may make of anything from this website. You agree and acknowledge the use of materials without permission may be liable to cause irreparable harm to chaiiwala® and in the instance of an unauthorised use, chaiiwala® will be within its rights to an injunction alongside other remedies available at law or in equity.

 


FEEDBACK AND SUBMISSIONS

You agree sole responsibility from now and going forward for the material you submit and you will not put forward items which could be deemed as obscene, offensive, abusive, defamatory and unlawful. You further agree not to submit any material to the site which may breach trademark, privacy, violate a third party, including copyright or other personal or proprietary right(s).

Any items issued to the site will be treated as granting chaiiwala® the use of a royalty free non-exclusive right and license to use, translate, display, adapt, modify, publish, transmit and reproduce, derivative works and subsequently issue these materials across the world in any format and medium through any way of distribution, transmission and display now and in the future to come. Furthermore, you grant chaiiwala® the permission that all so-called “moral rights” from your behalf have been waived.

 


LINKS

Sometimes we may provide links on the chaiiwala® website which may take you to sites that are not under the control of chaiiwala®. These have been merely been provided for ease of use and can in no way deemed to be seen as an endorsement by chaiiwala®. chaiiwala® indemnifies itself from any responsibility to content from any linked sites. You access them at your own risk.

 


PRIVACY & SECURITY

Please read our Privacy Policy to understand chaiiwala® policies regarding storage, usage and collection of any data from our online and instore guests.


DISCLAIMER

chaiiwala® is not responsible or liable to you or any third party for any issues, delays, errors, bugs in relation to the content of the chaiiwala® website or for any actions taken in reliance of it.

To the fullest extent allowed by applicable law, chaiiwala® cannot be held responsible or liable for any indirect, direct or consequential loss that may arise from the use of content from the chaiiwala® website or from links that may be found from this website. chaiiwala® does not seek to limit liability in respect of fraudulent misrepresentation nor in respect of death or personal injury directly caused by their negligence. chaiiwala® has taken the utmost care and attention when producing this website but does not give any guarantee of accuracy, reliability or accessibility. chaiiwala® also does not guarantee that the functionality of this website will be error free and uninterrupted or the server used to host this online portal will be free of bugs, viruses or other harmful components, or that flaws will be fixed even if chaiiwala® has been made aware.


MINORS

chaiiwala® asks parents and guardians to supervise their children while online.


APPLICABLE LAW

These terms and conditions are governed and will be interpreted in relation to English Law and any disputes relating to these terms of use will be exclusively subject to the jurisdiction of the English courts.

Company Information
Registered Address:
Chaiiwala Holdings Ltd
1 Camden St, Leicester , LE1 2AP
Company No. 09458607
